means: 摆脱不了的思想[情感等]

word_mean: 强迫观念：一种病态想法占优势的偏见，总是想到一种不合理的行为

sentence.Network_en: This government has developed an unhealthy obsession with secrecy.
sentence.Network_cn: 本届政府在保密方面做过了头。

sentence.Network_en: In therapy, she began to let go of her obsession with Mike.
sentence.Network_cn: 在心理治疗中，她开始逐渐放下对麦克的痴迷。

sentence.Network_en: His parents' obsession with keeping up appearances haunted his childhood.
sentence.Network_cn: 父母过于爱面子的做法在他儿时一直困扰着他。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 职称英语考试大纲(B级) - 豆丁网 ... obsess vt. (妄想等) 迷住； 使烦扰 obsession n. 迷住； 困扰 Oceania n. 大洋洲.
强迫症（obsession）的定义： 强迫症是指以反复出现强迫观念和强迫动作为基础特征的一类神经症性障碍。强迫观念是以刻板形成反 …
该病的基本症状是强迫观念(obsession)和强迫行为(compulsion)90%以上患者既有强迫观念也有强迫行为；但据Of等(1995)报告：28…
34．着魔（obsession）——同强迫性行为差不多，唯一分别是案主一生都受此影响。工作员人要尝试把案主的意念从萦徊之事物转移 …

list.abs: 强迫性性行为(英文：Sexual obsessions)，亦作性上瘾(英文：Sexual Addiction)、性瘾、性高潮瘾或做爱上瘾症，是一种与性行为相 …
而强迫行为（obsessive behavior）：具体表现，可以是屈从性强迫行为，如反复检查煤气是否关好、门是否锁上；可以是对抗性强迫 …
...obsessionalcompulsive reaction 执著强迫性反应obsessive action 强迫动作obsessive compulsive neurosis 强迫性神经官能症.
impulsive noise 脉冲噪声impulsive obsession 冲动欲impulsive sound 冲击音

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 16th cent. (in the sense 'siege'): from Latin obsessio(n-), from the verb obsidere (see obsess)

entry.def: If you say that someone has an obsession with a person or thing, you think they are spending too much time thinking about them.

example.ex: She would try to forget her obsession with Christopher...
example.tran: 她会努力忘记对克里斯托弗的迷恋。

example.ex: 95% of patients know their obsessions are irrational.
example.tran: 95％的病人都知道他们的痴迷是不理智的。

means.word_mean: 1. an irrational motive for performing trivial or repetitive actions against your will
2. an unhealthy and compulsive preoccupation with something or someone

auth_sentence.content: The obsession with "fairness" puts growth secondary.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The obsession with "fairness" puts growth secondary.

auth_sentence.content: Most OCD compulsions are logically related to their obsession.
auth_sentence.res_content: Most OCD compulsions are logically related to their obsession.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Most OCD compulsions are logically related to their obsession.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表示"某种物,用品;人等"; 2. 表名词,"动作或状态等"

stems_affixes.word_buile: accord和谐+ion某种物,用品;人等→n.手风琴
carr=carn肉+ion某种物,用品;人等→n.腐肉
champ+ion人→n.冠军,拥护者,战士
cush垫+ion某种物,用品;人等→n.垫子,软垫
manse住宅+ion某种物,用品;人等→n.大厦,大楼;宅第
product产品+ion某种物,用品;人等→n.生产,产品,作品
scorp原意为一种鱼,后指蝎子+ion某种物,用品;人等→n.蝎子
dismiss解散;开除+ion动作或状态等→n.免职,解雇,不予考虑

stems_affixes.value_cn: 允许进入,承认某事之陈述,供认
stems_affixes.word_buile: ad+miss送+ion动作或状态等→送来→许可进入
concise简明的+ion动作或状态等→n.简明,简洁
console安慰+at+ion动作或状态等→n.安慰,慰藉
contradict反驳,矛盾+ion动作或状态等→n.反驳,矛盾
create创造+ion动作或状态等→n.创造,创作物
dilapidate倒塌+ion动作或状态等→n.破旧,荒废

stems_affixes.value_cn: 辨别,区别,识别力,辨别力,歧视
stems_affixes.word_buile: discriminate歧视+ion动作或状态等→n.辨别,区别,识别力,辨别力,歧视
discuss讨论+ion动作或状态等→n.讨论,谈论;论述
edit编辑+ion状态→在以前的基础编辑后→版本,版
expanse膨胀扩张+ion动作或状态等→n.扩张,膨胀;张开,伸展
frict摩擦+ion动作或状态等→n.摩擦,摩擦力
lucubrate用功,深入研究+ion动作或状态等→n.刻苦研究

stems_affixes.value_cn: 航海,航空,导航,领航,航行
stems_affixes.word_buile: navigate航行,航海,导航+ion动作或状态等→n.航海,航空,导航,领航,航行
obligate有责任的+ion动作或状态等→n.义务,责任
obsess迷住,使困扰+ion动作或状态等→n.迷住,困扰
pollute弄脏,污染+ion动作或状态等→污染,玷污

stems_affixes.value_cn: 持有,拥有;所有权;所有物;[
stems_affixes.word_buile: possess占有,拥有+ion动作或状态等→n.持有,拥有;所有权;所有物;[n.]财产,财富
receipt收据,收到+ion动作或状态等→n.接待,招待会,接收
situate使处于+ion动作或状态等→n.情形,境遇

Sentence.sentence: An obsession (沉迷) with time – saving, gaining, wasting, losing, and mastering it – seems to have been a part of humanity for as long as human have existed.

sentences.en: With him, gambling is an obsession.
sentences.cn: 对于他来说, 赌博是无法摆脱的。

jushi.chinese: 对于他来说，赌博是无法摆脱的。

jushi.english: The media's obsession with the young prince continues.
jushi.chinese: 新闻媒体继续对小王子进行连篇累牍的报道。
